controllers

Class UserController

  • java.lang.Object
    • play.mvc.Results
      • play.mvc.Controller
        • controllers.UserController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    play.mvc.Http.HeaderNames, play.mvc.Http.Status

    public class UserController
extends play.mvc.Controller
    This controller contains an action to handle HTTP requests to the application's home page.

    • Method Detail

      • index

        public play.mvc.Result index()
        An action that renders an HTML page with a welcome message. The configuration in the routes file means that this method will be called when the application receives a GET request with a path of /.

        public play.mvc.Result getUsers()
        GET USERS - ALL
        Returns:
        IF there isn't any Users, return 404 - "No Users Found" else return 200 - all Users

        Returns:

      • getUser

        public play.mvc.Result getUser(java.lang.Long id)
        GET USERS BY ID - ALL
        Parameters:
        id - (Long) the id of a User
        Returns:
        IF the User doesn't exist, return 404 - "User does not exist" Else return 200 - User

      • getStatusUserText

        public static java.lang.String getStatusUserText()
        GET STATUT - ALL
        Returns:
        IF the User doesn't exist, return "None" Else IF getStatusUser = 0 return "SU" IF getStatusUser = 1 return "SC" IF getStatusUser = 2 return "Admin"

      • deleteUser

        public play.mvc.Result deleteUser(java.lang.Long id)
        DELETE USER BY ID
        Parameters:
        id - The User id
        Returns:
        IF User doesn't exist in the dababase, return 404 - "User does not exist." Else return 200 - "The User has been succesfully deleted"

      • login

        public play.mvc.Result login()
        LOGIN
        Returns:
        IF email or password does not match return 404 - "email or password incorrect" ELSE 200 - OK Cookie Created with ID + Token

      • isConnected

        public play.mvc.Result isConnected(java.lang.Long id,
                                   java.lang.String token)
        AUTHENTIFICATION
        Parameters:
        id - The User ID
        token - The User Token
        Returns:
        IF ID & Token Match 200 - OK Else return 404 - "Your connection is expired or invalid. Please log in again"

      • logout

        public play.mvc.Result logout()
        LOG OUT
        Returns:
        IF ID & Token Match 200 - OK & discard Cookie Else return 404 - "Log out error"

      • registerSU

        public play.mvc.Result registerSU()
        SIMPLE USER REGISTRATION
        Returns:
        IF email already used return 422 - "This email is already used" ELSE 200 - Created

      • addToCart

        public play.mvc.Result addToCart()
        ADD TO SHOPPING CART - SU
        Returns:
        IF User id does not match : 404 - "User doesn't exist" ELSE IF Product id does not match : 404 - "Product doesn't exist" ELSE 200 - OK
